item.title: Pretraining Codomain Attention Neural Operators for Solving Multiphysics PDEs
item.description: CoDA-NO, a novel neural operator, revolutionizes multiphysics PDE solving via codomain tokenization, enabling efficient self-supervised pretraining and few-shot learning for superior generalization.
